vfarcic.github.io

Training Prerequisites

  • Docker for Mac, Windows, or servers
  • Docker Compose
  • Docker Machine
  • Git
  • jq
  • GitBash (if Windows)

Installing Docker

  • Go to Docker Product and tool manuals (https://docs.docker.com/manuals/) and install Docker for Mac, Windows, or Linux.
docker version

docker-compose version

docker-machine version

Installing Git

  • Go to Git (https://git-scm.com/) and install it.
  • If you are a Windows user, make sure that Checkout As-Is is selected.
git version

Installing jq

  • Go to jq (https://stedolan.github.io/jq/) and install it.
jq
This site is open source. Improve this page.
